result.execSummary:
The defendant Linda P Kroll was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Misappropriate ID Info - Obtain Money, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.201(2)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Linda P Kroll in court with attorney Stephen Donald Willett.  Lester H Liptak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 16CF5, 16CF7, 16CF45, 16CF58, 16CF59, 16CF96, 16CM6.  Argument will be entered by both sides.  DE makes a statement to the court. 


16CF5-Court will order 9 months jail- all concurrent, CC, DNA sample/surcharge. No credit for this case

16CF6- Court will order 2 years prison/3 years extended supervision, STAYED.  Will order 5 years probation, One year jail as a condition of probation, concurrent with 16CF7, fine of $600.00, CC, DNA sample/Surcharge, 2 year Revocation of DL,  2 year IID, AODA assessment, will have huber for jail time.  4 days credit on this case.

16CF7-Court will order 2 years prison/3 years extended supervision, STAYED.  Will order 5 years probation, one year jail, concurrent with 16CF6, $600.00 fine, CC, DNA sample/Surcharge,  2 year Revocation of DL, 2 year IID, AODA assessment, will have huber for jail time.  16 days credit on this case.

16CF45-Court will order 2 years prison/3 years extended supervision, STAYED.  Will order 5 years probation, concurrent with 16CF6, 16CF7, CC, DNA sample/Surcharge, 34 days credit on this case.  Restitution of $1135.02

16CF96-Court will order 2 years prison/3 years extended supervision, STAYED.  Will order 5 years probation, concurrent with 16CF6, 16CF7, 16CF45,  CC, DNA sample/Surcharge, 11 days credit on this case.  Restitution of $470.10 from 16FO349

DE will comply with all recommendations of DOC.  

The defendant shall report to the Rusk County jail immediately.
DE has indicated undecided about seeking PCR

Court will allow this final adjourment for sentencing per Atty Willetts request,  informs parties this will be the final adjournment.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 1, 2017 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Linda P Kroll in court with attorney Stephen Donald Willett.  Defendant Linda P Kroll in custody.  James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 16CF6, 16CF7. 16CF45, 16CF58, 16CF59, 16CF96, 16CM6.  16CF45, 16CF58, 16CF59, 16CF96 all Preliminary Hearings.  DE/Atty will waive PH. Court instructs on waiver of PH, court will accept waiver.  Court reviews complaints, finds probable cause exists, will bind over for JT in all cases.  Information filed by the State.  Will proceed to arraignment.  Waive reading of all informations, enter a plea of NG to all counts.  Set for plea/sentencing 7/05/16 @ 3:30PM.  Atty would like to address the issue of bond in 16CF96.  State will stand mute.  $5000.00 sign bond, Absolutely no contact with Sandy Prouty. 16CF45 bond will be concurrent in all cases.

No contact with Sandra Prouty or N2714 Park St., Conrath.  All bonds concurrent.  No contact with Damien Kramer.  Defendant is not to possess or consume any medications not prescribed by a physician.  Not to possess or consume any illicit substances.  Must be enrolled in substance abuse counseling at Aurora, and must continue contact with Jeremy Jacobs.  DE will do PBT testing or UA at SD every day.  Will do between 7:15/7:30 every day.
